conclusion: The graph shows the position of the car as a function of time, with y-axis as position and x-axis as time.
The slope of the x-t graph represents the velocity of the car.
The line passes through the point (0, 10) and the origin (0, 0).
The change in position is 10 meters and the change in time is 2 seconds.
The velocity is calculated as 5 m/s using the slope formula.
The car's speed at the end of the 2nd second is 5 meters per second.
